This exceptional item is valued at $120 by us due to its unique features and high-quality materials. We believe it could significantly enhance your experience and bring value to your life. Would you be interested in exploring this opportunity further? If so, we can proceed with the purchase at this special price. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
